short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to manage your SharePoint workbench.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that gives you the ability to have a wider workbench when working with SPFX Webparts.

Default width is 1920px - but does scale down. 

If you think I can add to the functionality of this extension, please create a request in my Github.
